string.text:
A tactical, 9mm platform designed for versatility and high performance in urban and open-zone environments. With its AR-style frame and simple controls, it offers a blend of precision and rapid-fire capability. Its modular design allows for easy customization, while its compact size makes it ideal for close-quarter skirmishes or as a backup weapon in intense firefights. Equipped with a reliable recoil system and accuracy at range, the UDP-9 is a solid choice for any seeking a balance of firepower and maneuverability.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Angstadt Arms
